short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the word Zika into the word Genophage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A genophage is a disease that causes a genocide by disrupting reproduction. 

It is fitting to switch Zika to Genophage for two reasons:
-We are using biotechnology to cause mosquitos to be extinct slowly. This is done by inserting an infertility gene and releasing altered mosquitos into the breeding population. 
-Some have made the case to stop having children or to significantly alter how we have children because of the link between Zika and microcephaly.

This extension does not change the word when searching on Google.com!
Google search disables the extension. 

I made this not to scare people or tell people the world is over. It is to show that Zika is here, and it is an issue. We should not hide or be afraid, but to face our problems. Let's cure this thing!
